--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Netwrix Support [techsupport@netwrix.com]
Sent: 11/4/2024 1:58 PM
To: vinay.singh@wpp.com
Cc: scott.webber@netwrix.com
Subject: RE: Netwrix Support Ticket #412891 - Host Management Query Not Running [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0CG4s2:ref ]

Hi Vinay, thank you for your time on meeting today, today we've reviewed the issue status.

We've reviewed troubled hostlists:

1. GRM_AD_APPLICATIONS hostlist is working as intended, we've compared host count to AD host count for target OU, it matches.

2. GRM_AD_AZURE - doesn't have hosts, on attempt to run query manually - insufficient permissions error - please check with your team to resolve this. Once we'll get this working we can check if hosts are picked up correctly or not.

3. GRM_AD_EMEA - correct number of hosts, but no details for collected hosts, we've disabled clean up job and ran query manually, waiting for results.

So far the only issue left is with hostlists that collect hostnames and count, but do not collect details - example - GRM_AD_EMEA hostlist, lets review GRM_AD_EMEA scan results and escalate if needed.

You can book another meeting with me, using same link.

Best Regards,
Damir Akhmatshin
Support Engineer EMEA

www.netwrix.com

Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #412891 - Host Management Query Not Running

TextBody:
Hi Vinay, thank you for your time on meeting, we've reviewed the issue with Azure AD host list not getting populated, it looks like the issue is not constant and we were able to populate it, when we've run query manually.

Another issue is with EMEA host list, where not all details for hosts are populated in correct columns.

I will escalate this to development team and will keep you posted.

Best Regards,
Damir Akhmatshin
Support Engineer EMEA
